title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Improving Pre-Service Teacher Education Through Participatory Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of curriculum design, experience teaching social studies
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can derive curriculum improvement plans by applying a participatory design process.
Learners can propose at least three instructional design strategies reflecting learner perceptions.
Learners can complete team collaboration projects in a mobile microlearning environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
